name: Cube Quest (Tim Anderson)
description:
CUBE QUEST

Avoid orange obstacles as you run through this thrilling reflex tester!

Cube Quest is my first game. It is a simple runner where you guide a cube through several levels, avoiding orange obstacles and falling off the edge along the way.  It is built in Unity. 

Cube Quest is currently in the very early stages of development. The current playable build is a demo, more gameplay will be added soon.

Major bugfixes, gameplay, and content patches will be coming shortly. Stay tuned for updates with my Devblogs.

Controls

A and D to move left and right

MOUSE to interact with the UI
